common.confirmNewGame: Are you sure you want to start a new game? All unsaved progress will be lost.

characterCreation.title: Create Your Character
characterCreation.subtitle: Let's build your first D&D character step by step
characterCreation.identityTutorial: Let's define who your character is! Choose your race (which determines natural abilities), gender (optional, for name generation), and name. Your race affects your stats and special traits, while your name is how you'll be known in the world!
characterCreation.nameTutorial: Choose a name that fits your character's race and personality! You can type one or use the shuffle button to generate a random name based on your selected race and gender.
characterCreation.selectRaceFirst: Select a race first to generate an appropriate name!
characterCreation.name: Name
characterCreation.randomNameTip: Tip: Click the shuffle button to generate a random name
characterCreation.genderTutorial: Choose your character's gender identity. This helps personalize your adventure and affects name generation. It has no mechanical impact on gameplay.
characterCreation.raceTutorial: Your race determines your character's ancestry and some natural abilities. Each race has unique traits and ability score increases.
characterCreation.classTutorial: Your class defines your character's profession and abilities. Each class has different hit dice, primary abilities, and features.
characterCreation.backgroundTutorial: Your background represents your character's past. It grants skill proficiencies and helps define who your character was before becoming an adventurer.
characterCreation.abilityScoresTutorial: Ability scores represent your character's physical and mental capabilities. They range from 8 to 15 for a starting character. Each score has a modifier: (score - 10) / 2, rounded down.
characterCreation.portraitTutorial: Select a portrait to represent your hero. Portraits sync with your selected race and gender.
characterCreation.noPortraits: Select a race and gender to see portraits.
